trans-unit.source: Provides access to general information about a tablet pen.
trans-unit.target: 可用來存取 Tablet 畫筆的一般資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to record the coordinates of the stylus, even if the stylus leaves the bounds of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將記錄在手寫筆的座標，即使使用者將手寫筆離開<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> called `textBox1`, and that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUp>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusMove> events are connected to event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>呼叫`textBox1`，而且<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusDown>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUp>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusMove>事件都已連接至事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: 接聽這個事件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The event handler to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.GotStylusCapture" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 加入 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.GotStylusCapture" /> 附加事件的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: 接聽這個事件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.target: 要加入的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 加入 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.LostStylusCapture" /> 附加事件的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Captures the stylus that is bound to a particular element.
trans-unit.target: 捕捉繫結至特定項目的手寫筆。

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the stylus to.
trans-unit.target: 要捕捉手寫筆的目的項目。

trans-unit.source: Captures the stylus to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 將手寫筆捕捉至指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus is captured to <paramref name="element" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要捕捉手寫筆至 <paramref name="element" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> method to ensure that `element` receives stylus events even when the cursor goes out of the elements' bounds.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29>方法，以確保`element`接收手寫筆事件，即使資料指標超出範圍的項目。

trans-unit.source: To release the stylus, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.CaptureMode%29> with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> set to <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode.None>.
trans-unit.target: 若要放開手寫筆時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.CaptureMode%29>與<xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>設<xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode.None>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> method returns `false` if `element` is not visible or enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29>方法會傳回`false`如果`element`不的顯示和啟用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to record the coordinates of the stylus, even if the stylus leaves the bounds of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將記錄在手寫筆的座標，即使使用者將手寫筆離開<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> called `textBox1`, and that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUp>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusMove> events are connected to event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>呼叫`textBox1`，而且<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusDown>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUp>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusMove>事件都已連接至事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The element to capture the stylus to.
trans-unit.target: 要捕捉手寫筆的目的項目。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Captures the stylus to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 將手寫筆捕捉至指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus is captured to <paramref name="element" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要捕捉手寫筆至 <paramref name="element" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.CaptureMode%29> method to ensure that `element` receives stylus events even when the cursor goes out of the elements' bounds.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.CaptureMode%29>方法，以確保`element`接收手寫筆事件，即使資料指標超出範圍的項目。

trans-unit.source: To release the stylus, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.CaptureMode%29> with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode> set to <xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode.None>.
trans-unit.target: 若要放開手寫筆時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.CaptureMode%29>與<xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode>設<xref:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode.None>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.CaptureMode%29> method returns `false` if `element` is not visible or enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%28System.Windows.IInputElement%2CSystem.Windows.Input.CaptureMode%29>方法會傳回`false`如果`element`不的顯示和啟用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to record the coordinates of the stylus, even if the stylus leaves the bounds of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將記錄在手寫筆的座標，即使使用者將手寫筆離開<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> called `textBox1`, and that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUp>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusMove> events are connected to the event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>呼叫`textBox1`，而且<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusDown>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUp>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusMove>事件都已連接的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element to which the stylus is bound.
trans-unit.target: 取得手寫筆繫結的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> to which the stylus is bound.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to ensure that the stylus is not captured when the user touches the stylus to the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何確保使用者碰觸數位板將手寫筆，也不會擷取手寫筆。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.PreviewStylusDown> event is connected to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.PreviewStylusDown>事件已連結至事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the stylus that represents the stylus currently in use.
trans-unit.target: 取得手寫筆，表示目前使用中的手寫筆。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" /> that represents the stylus currently in use.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前使用中之手寫筆的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to erase the text that is selected with an inverted stylus.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何清除反轉的手寫筆已選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> called `textBox1` and that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUpEvent> event is connected to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>呼叫`textBox1`而且<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUpEvent>事件已連結至事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that is directly beneath the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 取得在手寫筆正下方的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> that is directly beneath the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 在手寫筆正下方的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine which element the stylus is positioned over.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何判斷手寫筆位於哪個項目。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> called `textBox1` and that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusInAirMove> event is connected to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>呼叫`textBox1`而且<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusInAirMove>事件已連結至事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> on which to determine whether flicks are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 要判斷其是否啟用筆觸的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsFlicksEnabled" /> attached property on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取得所指定元素上的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsFlicksEnabled" /> 附加屬性值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified element has flicks enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的項目已啟用筆觸，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In Windows Vista, a flick, one of the possible system gestures, is a short, quick, straight stroke that can be mapped to a navigation or shortcut command.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 上筆觸，其中一個可能的系統筆勢，會是簡短、 快速的筆觸可對應至巡覽或快速鍵命令。

trans-unit.source: By default, flicks are disabled on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，筆觸停用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>。

trans-unit.source: Flicks are enabled on all other controls.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他控制項時啟用筆觸。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether flicks are enabled on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何判斷上是否啟用筆觸<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> on which to determine whether press and hold is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 要判斷其是否啟用「按住不放」功能的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsPressAndHoldEnabled" /> attached property on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取得所指定元素上的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsPressAndHoldEnabled" /> 附加屬性值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified element has press and hold enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />;
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的項目已啟用「按住不放」功能，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to enable press and hold on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何啟用按住<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> called `horizontalSlider1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>呼叫`horizontalSlider1`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> on which to determine whether tap feedback enabled.
trans-unit.target: 要判斷其是否啟用按鍵回應的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsTapFeedbackEnabled" /> attached property on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取得所指定元素上的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsTapFeedbackEnabled" /> 附加屬性值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified element has tap feedback enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的項目已啟用按鍵回應，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In Windows Vista, a short animation occurs when the user taps the control.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 中，在使用者點選控制項時，就會發生簡短動畫。

trans-unit.source: By default, tap feedback is disabled on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，點選回應上已停用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: It is enabled on all other controls.
trans-unit.target: 它會啟用所有其他控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether tap feedback is enabled on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何判斷上是否已啟用點選回應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> on which to determine whether touch input feedback enabled.
trans-unit.target: 要判斷其是否啟用觸控輸入回應的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsTouchFeedbackEnabled" /> attached property on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取得所指定元素上的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsTouchFeedbackEnabled" /> 附加屬性值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if touch input feedback is enabled, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用觸控輸入回應，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether tap feedback is enabled on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何判斷上是否已啟用點選回應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: 接聽這個事件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The event handler to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUp" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 移除 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUp" /> 附加事件的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> on which to enable flicks.
trans-unit.target: 要啟用其筆觸的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable flicks; <see langword="false" /> to disable flicks.
trans-unit.target: 如果要啟用筆觸，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsFlicksEnabled" /> attached property on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 取得所指定元素上的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsFlicksEnabled" /> 附加屬性值。

trans-unit.source: In Windows Vista, a flick, one of the possible system gestures, is a short, quick, straight stroke that can be mapped to a navigation or shortcut command.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 上筆觸，其中一個可能的系統筆勢，會是簡短、 快速的筆觸可對應至巡覽或快速鍵命令。

trans-unit.source: By default, flicks are disabled on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，筆觸停用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>。

trans-unit.source: Flicks are enabled on all other controls.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他控制項時啟用筆觸。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to disable flicks on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何停用筆觸<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> on which to enable press and hold.
trans-unit.target: 要啟用「按住不放」功能的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable press and hold; <see langword="false" /> to disable press and hold.
trans-unit.target: 如果要啟用「按住不放」功能，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsPressAndHoldEnabled" /> attached property on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 設定所指定元素上的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsPressAndHoldEnabled" /> 附加屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Press and hold maps to the right-click on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 按住滑鼠右鍵來的對應。

trans-unit.source: In Windows Vista, you can disable this behavior on elements if you foresee a situation where the user might hold the tablet pen down without intending to simulate a right-click.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 中，您可以停用此行為項目上的如果您預期的情況下，使用者可能按住 tablet 畫筆而不想要模擬按一下滑鼠右鍵。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to enable press and hold on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何啟用按住<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> called `horizontalSlider1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>呼叫`horizontalSlider1`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> on which to enable tap feedback.
trans-unit.target: 要啟用按鍵回應的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable tap feedback; <see langword="false" /> to disable tap feedback.
trans-unit.target: 如果要啟用按鍵回應，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsTapFeedbackEnabled" /> attached property on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 設定所指定元素上的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsTapFeedbackEnabled" /> 附加屬性值。

trans-unit.source: In Windows Vista, a short animation occurs when the user taps the control.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 中，在使用者點選控制項時，就會發生簡短動畫。

trans-unit.source: By default, tap feedback is disabled on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，點選回應上已停用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: It is enabled on all other controls.
trans-unit.target: 它會啟用所有其他控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example disables tap feedback on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例上停用點選回應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> on which to enable tap feedback.
trans-unit.target: 要啟用按鍵回應的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable touch input feedback; <see langword="false" /> to disable touch input feedback.
trans-unit.target: 如果要觸控輸入回應，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsTouchFeedbackEnabled" /> attached property on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 設定所指定元素上的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.IsTouchFeedbackEnabled" /> 附加屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following example enables touch feedback on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會啟用觸控回應上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusButtonDown" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusButtonDown" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusButtonUp" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusButtonUp" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusDown" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusDown" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusEnter" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusEnter" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusInAirMove" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusInAirMove" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusInRange" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusInRange" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusLeave" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusLeave" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusMove" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusMove" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusOutOfRange" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusOutOfRange" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusSystemGesture" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusSystemGesture" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUp" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusUp" /> 附加事件。

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes the cursor and the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 同步處理游標和使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: Applications may need to determine the element on which the cursor is located.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可能需要判斷游標所在的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the application uses animation, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.DirectlyOver%2A> method might return an element that has moved out from under the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式使用動畫，<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.DirectlyOver%2A>方法可能會傳回從資料指標已經移出的項目。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Synchronize%2A> to be sure that <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.DirectlyOver%2A> returns the proper element.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Synchronize%2A>來確定<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.DirectlyOver%2A>傳回適當的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the element that is under the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何取得游標下的項目。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Synchronize%2A> ensures that <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.DirectlyOver%2A> returns the correct element.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Synchronize%2A>可確保<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.DirectlyOver%2A>傳回正確的項目。
